room_title: Escape room "Vintage Circus" by Granite State Escape in Manchester
review: We had such a fun time in the Vintage Circus room. They want you to succeed and knew we were very close. They gave us 10 extra minutes so we could! It only took us 5 min more. So thoughtful and such a great experience overall.

room_title: Escape room "Vintage Circus" by Granite State Escape in Manchester
review: We ended up trying the Vintage Circus while we were in town and the room was great. The pictures on the site don't do it justice. You ended up getting really into it and the puzzles were quite inventive which was nice to see. We can't wait to go back to try out their other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Vintage Circus" by Granite State Escape in Manchester
review: Could not have had more fun! This place is awesome! Made for a great girls night out to celebrate my friends birthday ! We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Vintage Circus" by Granite State Escape in Manchester
review: The level of thought and detail that went into the puzzles was astounding! We went to GSE for my bachelor party and all the guys (including myself) had an absolute blast. The team that puts the puzzles together here is top notch. I cannot recommend them enough.

room_title: Escape room "Vintage Circus" by Granite State Escape in Manchester
review: I absolutely recommend it! The owner was fantastic and absolutely accommodating and fun! We have done this before in Singapore and we were not disappointed here. Very creative!!! Five stars!!!
